properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 6 at 2:33PM PST until January 7 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 12 to 15 feet at 11 seconds
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 20 to
25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 12 to 14 feet at 12
seconds expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head
OR out 10 NM and Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade
Head OR from 10 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 1 AM to 4 PM PST Tuesday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 1 AM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST TUESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM PST TUESDAY
